property.name: tsd.network.port
property.description: The TCP port TSD should use for communications, default 4242.

property.name: tsd.core.auto_create_metrics
property.description: Whether or not to automatically create UIDs for new metric types.

property.name: tsd.http.staticroot
property.description: The location of static files for the HTTP GUI interface.

property.name: tsd.http.cachedir
property.description: Where TSD should write it's cache files to.

property.name: tsd.network.tcp_no_delay
property.description: Disable Nagel's algorithm. Default is True

property.name: tsd.network.keep_alive
property.description: Determines whether or not to send keepalive packets to peers, default is True

property.name: tsd.network.reuse_address
property.description: Determines if the same socket should be used for new connections, default is True

property.name: tsd.network.async_io
property.description: Whether or not to use NIO or tradditional blocking IO, defaults to True

property.name: tsd.storage.enable_compaction
property.description: Whether or not to enable data compaction in HBase, default is True

property.name: tsd.storage.flush_interval
property.description: How often, in milliseconds, to flush the data point queue to storage, default is 1,000

property.name: tsd.storage.hbase.data_table
property.description: Name of the HBase table where data points are stored, default is "tsdb". NOTE: Changing this value will require the table to be manually created.

property.name: tsd.storage.hbase.uid_table
property.description: Name of the HBase table where UID information is stored, default is "tsdb-uid". NOTE: Changing this value will require the table to be manually created.
